summary: The mutation is observed in 63.6% (119/187) of tumor tissues, predominantly in PTC.
Partial response 10/26 patients and best overall response 38.5%

tier_level_criteria: Well-established in vitro functional study showing a deleterious effect.
summary: The mutation induces an elevated kinase activity.
Improved overall survival of patients with Dabrafenib.
Median Survival is longer in patients carrying EGFR L858R than WT EGFR.
On May 2013, FDA approved Erlotinib as 1st-line treatment of NSCLC carrying L858R.

tier_level_criteria: Well-powered study with consensus from experts in the field (Tier I)
summary: Assessment of drug sensitivity for L858R by MANO method.

tier_level_criteria: Well-established in vitro functional study showing a deleterious effect.
summary: Transforming potential of the mutant is high.
Overall survival (median, 20.4 v 6.9 months; P = .0001) were significantly better with Gefitinib.
EGFR T790M is the most common mechanism of acquired resistance.
